name: Old School
desc: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

name: We're the Millers
desc: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

name: Ted 2
desc: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

name: Ted
desc: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear, Ted or his girlfriend, Lori.

name: The Hangover Part III
desc: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.

name: The Hangover
desc: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

name: The Hangover Part II
desc: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

name: Burnt
desc: Adam Jones (Bradley Cooper) is a chef who destroyed his career with drugs and diva behavior. He cleans up and returns to London, determined to redeem himself by spearheading a top restaurant that can gain three Michelin stars.

name: Chef
desc: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.

name: The Judge
desc: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth and, along the way, reconnects with his estranged family.

name: U.S. Marshals
desc: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
desc: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

name: War for the Planet of the Apes
desc: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

name: The Highwaymen
desc: The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde.

name: Savages: The Interrogations
desc: California entrepreneurs Ben (Aaron Johnson) and Chon (Taylor Kitsch) run a lucrative business raising marijuana and share a one-of-a-kind love with beautiful O (Blake Lively). Life in ...                    See full summary »

name: Wall Street
desc: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

name: Diarios de motocicleta
desc: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

name: Far and Away
desc: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

name: Edge of Tomorrow
desc: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
desc: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

name: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

name: Fatal Attraction
desc: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

name: King of California
desc: An unstable dad who after getting out of a mental institution tries to convince his daughter that there's Spanish gold buried somewhere under suburbia.

name: Project Power
desc: When a pill that gives its users unpredictable superpowers for five minutes hits the streets of New Orleans, a teenage dealer and a local cop must team with an ex-soldier to take down the group responsible for its creation.

name: Memoirs of a Geisha
desc: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

name: Basic Instinct
desc: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

name: Any Given Sunday
desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
desc: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

name: The Lives of Others
desc: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

name: The General's Daughter
desc: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

name: The Gentlemen
desc: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

name: Red Dragon
desc: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

name: Mercury Rising
desc: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

name: Swordfish
desc: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

name: National Lampoon's Vacation
desc: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

name: American Psycho
desc: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

name: Inglourious Basterds
desc: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
desc: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
desc: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

name: The Devil's Advocate
desc: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

name: Dirty Harry
desc: When a madman calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces the city, tough-as-nails San Francisco Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and ferret out the crazed psychopath.

name: Savages
desc: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

name: The Firm
desc: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

name: The Salt of the Earth
desc: The life and work of photographer Sebastião Salgado, who has spent forty years documenting deprived societies in hidden corners of the world.

name: Father of the Year
desc: Before NYC, college valedictorian Ben visits his trailer park loser dad. Same evening Ben argues with Larry about whose dad can kick the other dad's ass. Loser dad hears of this and tries to beat up doormat dad and chaos follows.

name: Ben Is Back
desc: A drug addicted teenage boy shows up unexpectedly at his family's home on Christmas Eve.

name: National Parks Adventure
desc: Coinciding with the National Parks Centennial, National Parks Adventure celebrates America's natural wonders. Narrated by Robert Redford, it follows a trio of adventurers and revisits Roosevelt and Muir's camping trip when the Park System was born.

name: Find Me Guilty
desc: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

name: Blade Runner
desc: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

name: Soul Plane
desc: Things get raucously funny aboard the maiden flight of a black-owned airline, thanks to some last-minute passenger additions.

name: 25th Hour
desc: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
desc: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

name: Zodiac
desc: In the late 1960s/early 1970s, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

name: Runaway Jury
desc: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

name: The Net
desc: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

name: The Princess Bride
desc: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
desc: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

name: The Help
desc: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

name: Mommy Dead and Dearest
desc: In this documentary, the murder of Deedee Blanchard by her daughter Gypsey Rose is explored, as well as the circumstances leading up to the event.

name: Awakenings
desc: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
desc: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

name: Once Upon a Time in America
desc: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

name: Once Upon a Time in the West
desc: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

name: Bad Santa
desc: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

name: Home Alone 3
desc: Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.

name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
desc: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

name: Home Alone
desc: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

name: Half Nelson
desc: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

name: The Catcher Was a Spy
desc: A former major league baseball player, Moe Berg, goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.

name: Friday
desc: Two homies, Smokey and Craig Jones, smoke a dope dealer's weed and try to figure a way to get the two hundred dollars they owe to the dealer by 10 p.m. that same night.

name: All Eyez on Me
desc: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

name: The Nice Guys: Word of the Day
desc: A series of thirteen Instagram shorts, based on Healy's 'word of the day' calendar, in which we are given a word and its definition and then treated to a short clip from The Nice Guys (2016) that relates in some way.

name: The Place Beyond the Pines
desc: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

name: The Social Network
desc: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

name: The Big Short
desc: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

name: Fool's Gold
desc: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.

name: Bird Box
desc: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

name: Gravity
desc: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

name: Miss Congeniality
desc: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

name: The Proposal
desc: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

name: Trading Places
desc: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

name: Sixteen Candles
desc: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

name: A History of Violence
desc: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

name: Dear Zachary: A Letter to a Son About His Father
desc: A filmmaker decides to memorialize a murdered friend when his friend's ex-girlfriend announces she is expecting his son.

name: A Perfect World
desc: Kidnapped boy Phillip Perry (T.J. Lowther) strikes up a friendship with his captor Butch Haynes (Kevin Costner): an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search is headed up by honorable Texas Ranger "Red" Garrett (Clint Eastwood).

name: The People vs. Larry Flynt
desc: The story of a controversial pornography publisher and how he became a defender of free speech.

name: Southpaw
desc: A champion boxer fights to get his daughter back from child protective services as well as revive his professional career, after a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction.

name: Crash
desc: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

name: Wonder Wheel
desc: On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife, and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.

name: My Best Friend's Wedding
desc: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

name: Smokin' Aces
desc: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
desc: Samantha Caine lives in a small town with her daughter. Eight years ago she emerged, two months pregnant, from a nearby river with no memory of her past or who she is. However, she's getting closer to finding out about her past.

name: Young Guns II
desc: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

name: Young Guns
desc: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

name: Gisaengchung
desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

name: Memento
desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

name: The Terminal
desc: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

name: Gangs of New York
desc: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

name: In Bruges
desc: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

name: Know Your Enemy - Japan
desc: A comprehensive look at the war in the Pacific during World War II. Shot as a propaganda film by acclaimed Hollywood director Frank Capra

name: New Jack City
desc: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

name: Friday Night Lights
desc: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

name: Baby Driver
desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

name: Hell or High Water
desc: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

name: Slow West
desc: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

name: The Missing
desc: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

name: Beasts of No Nation
desc: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

name: Falling Down
desc: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

name: The Crush
desc: A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl, who proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.

name: The Founder
desc: The story of Ray Kroc, a salesman who turned two brothers' innovative fast food eatery, McDonald's, into the biggest restaurant business in the world, with a combination of ambition, persistence, and ruthlessness.

name: Pacific Heights
desc: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
desc: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: Unforgiven
desc: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

name: The Ghan: Australia's Greatest Train Journey
desc: The Ghan is an innovative three-hour documentary that takes the viewer on an immersive, visually stunning journey on Australia's most iconic passenger train. In Australia's first 'Slow TV' ...                    See full summary »

name: Terminator: Dark Fate
desc: An augmented human and Sarah Connor must stop an advanced liquid Terminator from hunting down a young girl, whose fate is critical to the human race.

name: Incendies
desc: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

name: The Patriot
desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

name: Concussion
desc: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

name: Draft Day
desc: At the NFL Draft, General Manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

name: The Longest Yard
desc: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

name: Radio
desc: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

name: Invincible
desc: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

name: Remember the Titans
desc: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

name: Jerry Maguire
desc: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

name: Joker
desc: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

name: Shaft
desc: JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from MIT, enlists his family's help to uncover the truth behind his best friend's untimely death.

name: Jackie Brown
desc: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

name: Fractured
desc: A couple stops at a gas station, where their 6 y.o. daughter's arm is fractured. They hurry to a hospital. Something strange is going on there. The wife and daughter go missing.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
desc: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

name: Legends of the Fall
desc: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

name: The Green Mile
desc: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

name: Fight Club
desc: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

name: Antwone Fisher
desc: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.

name: Arrival
desc: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecrafts appear around the world.

name: The Old Man & the Gun
desc: Based on the true story of Forrest Tucker and his audacious escape from San Quentin at the age of 70 to an unprecedented string of heists that confounded authorities and enchanted the public.

name: The Drop
desc: Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deep into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living - no matter the cost.

name: Die Hard
desc: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

name: Second Act
desc: A big box store worker reinvents her life and her life-story and shows Madison Avenue what street smarts can do.

name: Captain Fantastic
desc: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

name: Ad Astra
desc: Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.

name: It Chapter Two
desc: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.

name: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
desc: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

name: Good Boys
desc: Three 6th grade boys ditch school and embark on an epic journey while carrying accidentally stolen drugs, being hunted by teenage girls, and trying to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party.

name: Night on Earth
desc: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

name: Double Jeopardy
desc: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

name: Escape from Alcatraz
desc: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

name: In the Line of Fire
desc: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan (Clint Eastwood) couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

name: Magnolia
desc: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

name: Quantum of Solace
desc: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

name: Dream House
desc: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

name: Casino Royale
desc: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

name: Men in Black: International
desc: The Men in Black have always protected the Earth from the scum of the universe. In this new adventure, they tackle their biggest threat to date: a mole in the Men in Black organization.

name: In the Name of the Father
desc: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

name: Alpha Dog
desc: Johnny and a couple pals kidnap Jake's 15-year-old brother, Zach, then assigns his buddy Frankie to be Zach's minder. They develop a brotherly friendship. Zach parties with his captors as things begin to spin out of control.

name: Detachment
desc: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

name: The Lookout
desc: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.

name: The Brothers Bloom
desc: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

name: Léon
desc: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

name: RocknRolla
desc: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.

name: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
desc: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
desc: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

name: Spotlight
desc: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

name: Blade Runner 2049
desc: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

name: Moneyball
desc: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

name: The Revenant
desc: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road
desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

name: Lawless
desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

name: Free Solo
desc: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.

name: Out of Time
desc: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

name: The Pelican Brief
desc: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

name: Green Book
desc: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

name: A Simple Plan
desc: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

name: Widows
desc: Four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities take fate into their own hands and conspire to forge a future on their own terms.

name: Bohemian Rhapsody
desc: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

name: Per un pugno di dollari
desc: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

name: Million Dollar Baby
desc: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

name: The Rainmaker
desc: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

name: Monster
desc: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

name: Papillon
desc: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

name: Silk Road: Drugs, Death and the Dark Web
desc: The Silk Road, described as the Amazon of illegal drugs, appeared on the Dark Web in 2011. The brainchild of a mysterious, libertarian intellectual who evaded all attempts to track him down until a young IRS inspector cracked the case.

name: 2 Guns
desc: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.

name: Blood Diamond
desc: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

name: The Hateful Eight
desc: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

name: Lakeview Terrace
desc: Based on a true story, a troubled and racist African-American L.A.P.D. Officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.

name: Shaft
desc: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

name: Coach Carter
desc: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

name: A Time to Kill
desc: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

name: The Late Bloomer
desc: The story of an adult male who, after the successful removal of a benign tumor resting against his pituitary gland, experiences all the changes and effects of puberty over a three-week period.

name: The Negotiator
desc: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

name: The Bone Collector
desc: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

name: 8MM
desc: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

name: Law Abiding Citizen
desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

name: BlacKkKlansman
desc: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

name: Reservoir Dogs
desc: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

name: Gladiator
desc: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: xXx
desc: An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.

name: Thelma & Louise
desc: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

name: Outlaw King
desc: A true David vs. Goliath story of how the 14th century Scottish 'Outlaw King' Robert the Bruce used cunning and bravery to defeat the much larger and better equipped occupying English army.

name: The Hurricane
desc: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

name: Malcolm X
desc: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

name: American Reunion
desc: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.

name: American Pie 2
desc: Jim and his friends are now in college, and they decide to meet up at the beach house for some fun.

name: The Change-Up
desc: Dave is a married man with three kids and a loving wife, and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain, lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

name: Role Models
desc: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.

name: Bad Santa 2
desc: Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.

name: Walk the Line
desc: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

name: A Simple Favor
desc: Stephanie is a single mother with a parenting vlog who befriends Emily, a secretive upper-class woman who has a child at the same elementary school. When Emily goes missing, Stephanie takes it upon herself to investigate.

name: The Age of Adaline
desc: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.

name: Point Break
desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

name: Almost Famous
desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

name: Batman Begins
desc: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
desc: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

name: The Dark Knight
desc: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

name: Public Enemies
desc: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
desc: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

name: Life
desc: In 1932, two strangers are wrongfully convicted and develop a strong friendship in prison that lasts them through the 20th century.

name: Beverly Hills Cop
desc: Aaron Foley, a police officer on the rise, tries to escape from under the shadow of his father's legacy in Detroit by busting the rich and famous of Beverly Hills.

name: Mr. Church
desc: "Mr. Church" tells the story of a unique friendship that develops when a little girl and her dying mother retain the services of a talented cook - Henry Joseph Church. What begins as a six month arrangement instead spans into fifteen years and creates a family bond that lasts forever.

name: Layer Cake
desc: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

name: 8 Mile
desc: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

name: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
desc: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

name: Nebraska
desc: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

name: The Descendants
desc: A land baron tries to reconnect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.

name: The Ides of March
desc: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

name: Up in the Air
desc: Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire presenting a new business model.

name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
desc: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

name: Snatch
desc: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

name: Heat
desc: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

name: End of Watch
desc: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

name: Gone Baby Gone
desc: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

name: The Beach
desc: Vicenarian Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss. Excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

name: The Lincoln Lawyer
desc: A lawyer defending a wealthy man begins to believe his client is guilty of more than just one crime.

name: The Bourne Supremacy
desc: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

name: The Bourne Identity
desc: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

name: Straight Outta Compton
desc: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in Los Angeles, California, in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes Hip Hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

name: Brooklyn
desc: An Irish immigrant lands in 1950s Brooklyn, where she quickly falls into a romance with a local. When her past catches up with her, however, she must choose between two countries and the lives that exist within.

name: Enemy of the State
desc: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

name: The Score
desc: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

name: 300: Rise of an Empire
desc: Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

name: Bright
desc: A detective must work with an Orc to find a powerful wand before evil creatures do.

name: Mud
desc: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

name: Malèna
desc: Amidst the war climate, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.

name: John Q
desc: John Quincy Archibald takes a hospital emergency room hostage when his insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant.

name: The Blind Side
desc: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
desc: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

name: Rain Man
desc: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

name: Seven Pounds
desc: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

name: Avatar
desc: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

name: Cast Away
desc: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

name: Flight
desc: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

name: Life of Pi
desc: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

name: Silver Linings Playbook
desc: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

name: The Butler
desc: As Cecil Gaines serves eight presidents during his tenure as a butler at the White House, the civil rights movement, Vietnam, and other major events affect this man's life, family, and American society.

name: Captain Phillips
desc: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

name: I Am Legend
desc: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure in this post-apocalyptic action thriller.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

name: Goodfellas
desc: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

name: Scent of a Woman
desc: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
desc: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

name: 12 Years a Slave
desc: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

name: Into the Wild
desc: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

name: Jagten
desc: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: The Wolf of Wall Street
desc: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

name: Midnight Run
desc: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

name: October Sky
desc: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

name: Mission: Impossible
desc: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
desc: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

name: Fences
desc: A working-class African-American father tries to raise his family in the 1950s, while coming to terms with the events of his life.

name: The Nice Guys
desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

name: Primal Fear
desc: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

name: The Infiltrator
desc: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

name: American Beauty
desc: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

name: The Intouchables
desc: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

name: Wild
desc: A chronicle of one woman's one thousand one hundred mile solo hike undertaken as a way to recover from a recent personal tragedy.

name: Selma
desc: A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.

name: Warcraft
desc: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
desc: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

name: Now You See Me 2
desc: The Four Horsemen resurface, and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.

name: Suicide Squad
desc: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

name: Dallas Buyers Club
desc: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

name: Shutter Island
desc: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

name: Nightcrawler
desc: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

name: A Beautiful Mind
desc: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

name: Donnie Brasco
desc: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

name: Fargo
desc: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

name: Ocean's Eleven
desc: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

name: American Gangster
desc: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

name: American History X
desc: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

name: The Departed
desc: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

name: Pulp Fiction
desc: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

name: Se7en
desc: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

name: Training Day
desc: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

name: The Town
desc: A longtime thief, planning his next job, tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to an earlier heist, and a hell-bent F.B.I Agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

name: Cidade de Deus
desc: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

name: Taxi Driver
desc: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

name: Scarface
desc: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

name: The Usual Suspects
desc: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

name: No Country for Old Men
desc: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
desc: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

name: L.A. Confidential
desc: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

name: Collateral
desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

name: Django Unchained
desc: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

name: Zootopia
desc: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

name: Catch Me If You Can
desc: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl, becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man. But Frank not only eludes capture, he revels in the pursuit.

name: La vita è bella
desc: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
desc: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

name: Forrest Gump
desc: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
desc: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
desc: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

name: Interstellar
desc: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: Gone Girl
desc: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

name: Dumb and Dumber To
desc: 20 years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.
